I bought the actual bluray before downloading this file.  Honestly, there is no difference. But, imho, this is not bluray quality.  There is a thin veal of grain over the screen and a yellow tint. I believe that's what the creator wanted, but to me the rating is as follows:
a = 10
v = 8

@imakewebs
The reason being is that they re-encode the raw bluray. If this was just the actual raw footage from the bluray the file size would range from 15-40gigs. They re-encode the footage down with H.264 to a more reasonable size for users to download.
